nodes.text: Airten was a light-skinned Human male sergeant of the Bespin Wing Guard, the main security force of Cloud City on the gas giant Bespin, during the Galactic Civil War. A burly Wing Guard member, his large size prevented him from becoming a pilot; however, joining the Wing Guard, Airten's nonstandard build did not matter to Lando Calrissian, the city's Baron Administrator. Airten was a sympathizer of the Alliance to Restore the Republic. He wore the standard uniform for the Bespin Wing Guard. He also wielded a blaster pistol.
Sergeant Airten first appeared on a card for the Premiere set of Decipher's 2001 Jedi Knights Trading Card Game.
